text: Arnaldo Forlani (; 8 December 1925 - 6 July 2023) was an Italian politician. He served as the 44th Prime Minister of Italy from 18 October 1980 to 28 June 1981.1981: Italy in crisis as cabinet resigns BBC.co.uk accessed 23 January 2008 He was previously a member of the right-wing of the Italian Christian Democratic Party. Forlani died on 6 July 2023 in Rome, Italy at the age of 97. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1925 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Italy Category:Politicians from Marche
